title: Article 98: Committee procedure | AI Act Service Desk
text:
```markdown
# Article 98: Committee procedure

## Chapter XI: Delegation of Power and Committee Procedure

### Article 98: Committee procedure

1. The Commission shall be assisted by a committee. That committee shall be a committee within the meaning of Regulation (EU) No 182/2011.

2. Where reference is made to this paragraph, [Article 5](/en/ai-act/article-5) of Regulation (EU) No 182/2011 shall apply.

#### Relevant recitals

*   [Recital 175](/en/ai-act/recital-175)

View the [official text](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=OJ:L_202401689). The text used in this tool is the ‘[Artificial Intelligence Act (Regulation (EU) 2024/1689), Official version of 13 June 2024](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=OJ:L_202401689)’.
```
